comment: She is very nice but heeps a lot of work on you.  Honestly, I had more work in this class than in English 1102 and math combined.  She expects you to get a lot done without clear guidelines.  Take KSU 1101.  I've heard they do barely anything.
She is nice but kind of disorganized. She changes due dates constantly, so it can get confusing. This class has a lot of work and its pretty pointless. We kinda used the book but barely.

Dorothy is a super sweet teacher. She was helpful, and made herself available always. There was a lot of work for this class. There is a couple papers, 10 + hours of community service and a group project. Easy class, but a lot of work. Never used book.
